mapper.select: select no, dong, apartmentName, aptCode, dealAmount, buildYear, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor, lat, lng, jibun from housedeal join houseinfo using(aptCode) where dongCode = (select distinct dongCode from dongcode where dongName = #{dongName} LIMIT 1)

select no, dong, apartmentName, aptCode, dealAmount, buildYear, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor, lat, lng, jibun from housedeal join houseinfo using(aptCode) where apartmentName like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select distinct sidoName from dongcode order by sidoName
select distinct gugunName from dongcode where sidoName =#{sidoName} and gugunName is not null order by gugunName
select distinct dongName from dongcode where gugunName =#{gugunName} and dongName is not null order by dongName

SELECT no, dong, apartmentName, aptCode, dealAmount, buildYear, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor, lat, lng, jibun FROM housedeal JOIN houseinfo USING (aptCode) WHERE dongCode = (SELECT DISTINCT dongCode FROM dongcode WHERE sidoName = #{sidoName} AND gugunName = #{gugunName} AND dongName = #{dongName})

SELECT no, dong, apartmentName, aptCode, dealAmount, buildYear, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor, lat, lng, jibun FROM housedeal JOIN houseinfo USING (aptCode) WHERE dongCode = (SELECT DISTINCT dongCode FROM dongcode WHERE sidoName = #{sidoName} AND gugunName = #{gugunName} AND dongName = #{dongName}) AND dealYear = #{year} AND dealMonth = #{month}
